mapper.insert: insert into t_board ( title, ctnt, writer ) values ( #{title}, #{ctnt}, #{writer} )
mapper.select: select iboard,title,writer,created_at cratedAt from t_board order by iboard desc LIMIT ${startIdx},${rowLen}
